The Bottom Line. The free-to-play Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is arguably one of the most iconic FPS titles of its generation. The new Panorama UI drastically improves its interface, but the gameplay can sometimes feel repetitive.

This game is fun,
i have been playing since 2017 on and off. I haven't been global just yet but i will get there one day... When i first started i played so much casual i didn't even know that competitive was a thing and gave you a comp rank and more XP to rank up.

Every now and then i run into a toxic player or even a toxic team. They judge you for your rank and how you play and they will swear and eventually they will vote kick you. 

I'm writing this review on my alt account. 

Despite everything this game is very fun i give it 10/10.
